reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress comfortable and true to size, with one noting its stretchy fabric. Moreover, the dress receives positive feedback for its quality, with one customer highlighting its flattering waist and bust accentuation. Additionally, the fabric is soft and well-liked, and customers appreciate the color options, with many loving the red and black versions.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful, Comfortable, and Perfect for Fall Weddings!
items.body: I absolutely loved this dress! It fits beautifully and has a nice, flowy feel—perfect for dancing at a wedding. The fabric is not see-through at all, and it has a bit of stretch, which makes it super comfortable to wear all day and night. I wore it as a guest to my boyfriend’s friend’s wedding, and it was perfect for the occasion. The color is lovely for a fall event, and overall, it’s definitely great value for the price. Highly recommend! Read more
items.author: Skylar Petrik

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Red is GORGEOUS!!!
items.body: If I could give this 10 stars I would! It's stretchy, comfortable and very flattering! The material provides coverage so nothing underneath shows. The way the bodice is made it gives you a very flattering fit and the skirt allows for just enough leg to show. I felt very pretty in this dress and can't wait to wear it again at my next event! I went to an event in 30 degree weather so I found a cropped white faux fur jacket to pair with it, silver glittery shoes and clutch. Read more
items.author: A. Caples

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Flattering, good quality, great value
items.body: Wife's review: I bought the XL in navy blue to wear on a cruise, and it's the most flattering dress I have. It hides the chubs I've acquired over the last 50-some years, falls nicely over my tush without revealing every imperfection. The fabric is good quality, with just enough stretch to be very comfortable. Not see-through. I wish this came in prints, because I would buy more. I'm not sure it's a "cocktail" dress, maybe a little boring for that. It's too low-cut for some settings, but you could easily pin the crossover neckline for modesty if needed. It traveled very well, and came out of the luggage ready to wear after being packed for 3 days. Read more
items.author: Steve Cox

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very forgiving in the waist
items.body: The material is very giving. And its very forgiving in the waist. Its a bit heavy, but well made. It wasnt right for the wedding I wanted it for, but I will save it for another occasion . Pretty over all . Read more
items.author: Lori Jackson

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect, Faultless Dress!
items.body: I am absolutely in love with this dress! It is truly faultless and exceeded all my expectations. The fabric is fantastic—it's incredibly soft, and the fit is wonderfully cozy and comfortable. The slight stretch in the material is a great touch, making it easy to move in and ensuring a perfect fit. This dress is very flowy and graceful, and it moves beautifully with you. I am 5'2", and the length was perfect on me, especially when I paired it with a one-inch wedge heel. The color was also exactly as shown in the photos, which is always a relief. I honestly want to buy this dress in every color they offer. It's the perfect combination of comfort, style, and quality. I would absolutely buy this dress again and highly recommend it! Read more
items.author: Gera

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing Wedding Guest Dress!
items.body: Absolutely loved this dress. I was scrambling for a last minute wedding guest dress and am SO happy I ordered this one to try. I thought I had found my dress until this one arrived 3 days before it was needed. It fits perfectly according to the size chart and for a curvy, big busted woman, it’s been a long while since I felt so comfortable and pretty in a dress. It is so flattering for curvier ladies and not revealing in the chest for us bustier gals. I would recommend this dress to anyone. Read more
items.author: camille boyd

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great dress
items.body: I needed a last minute dress. It fit perfect and was very flattering. I did have to steam it due to packing but it was the perfect length and style. Nice quality and comfortable. Read more
items.author: Popi

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this dress!!
items.body: Beautiful dress and just as described. The peacock blue is a gorgeous color and this was super soft and flowy. The fit was perfect and very flattering (5'4", 148 lbs, 38D, size L). Got so many compliments on it! I plan to purchase another one in a different color as well. Read more
items.author: Maya Braden

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Evening Split V Neck Formal Cocktail is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Evening Split V Neck Formal Cocktail is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Glitter - Peacock Blue, Deep Coffee Brown, Olive Green, Army Green, Black, Coffee, Glitter - Bright Red, Brick Red, Glitter - Burgundy, Glitter - Blue, Aqua Blue, Glitter - Army Green, Mustard Yellow, Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
